DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effect of Ivabradine vs Atenolol on heart rate and effort tolerance in patients with mild to moderate mitral stenosis and normal sinus rhythm.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Ivabradine on Heart Rate & Effort Tolerance in Mitral Stenosis in Sinus Rhythm
DOC.criteria: 1. Mild to moderate mitral stenosis (Mitral valve area: 1.0 cm2 2.0 cm2 on echocardiography) with normal sinus rhythm 2. Age >18 years 3. Need for rate control therapy for symptoms 1. Atrial fibrillation 2. Other significant valvular lesions (More than mild AS/AR/MR) 3. Denial of consent 4. Unable to do TMT/Contraindication for TMT 5. Need for surgical treatment or BMV 6. Presence of significant noncardiac comorbidities 7. Pregnancy
